# StoreButtonKind

**Structure**

A button to display in a store view or subscription store view.

## Declaration

```swift
struct StoreButtonKind
```

## Overview

Use the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/View/storeButton(_:for:)] modifier on a view to set the visibility of the buttons.

## Getting button types for store views

- **cancellation**: A type of button that people use to dismiss the current store presentation.
- **restorePurchases**: A type of button that people use to restore purchases.

## Getting additional button types for subscription store views

- **signIn**: A type of button that people use to sign in.
- **redeemCode**: A type of button that people use to redeem an offer code.
- **policies**: A type of button that people use to display store policies.

## Configuring accessory buttons

- **storeButton(_:for:)**: Specifies the visibility of auxiliary buttons that store view and subscription store view instances may use.
- **subscriptionStoreSignInAction(_:)**: Adds an action to perform when a person uses the sign-in button on a subscription store view within a view.
- **SubscriptionOfferViewButtonKind**
